text: The 2002–03 Tampa Bay Lightning season was the 11th National Hockey League (NHL) season in Tampa, Florida. The Lightning made it back to the Stanley Cup playoffs for the first time since 1996. ==Regular season== ===Final standings=== ===Game log=== {| class="wikitable" width="70%" |- ! width="2%" | No. !
